name: Mutiny (Gentle Tortoise)
description:
Made for the Weekly Game Jam 149, the theme is "Last one left"

Mutiny is a pirate themed game about being the last pirate captain on ship. How do you do that? Keep the captain's hat on you as long as you can

You gain points the longer you have the hat, and lose points on death.

Player 1 uses WASD to move and K to attack.

Player 2 uses Arrow Keys to move and Left Control to attack.

Escape to go back to main menu, and again on the menu to quit the game.
